message: sampling_resource_anthropic: Lifecycle task encountered an error: generator didn't stop after athrow()

Error in sampling: Anthropic API key not configured

The Anthropic API key is required but not set.
Add it to your configuration file under anthropic.api_key or set the ANTHROPIC_API_KEY environment variable.

The Openai API key is required but not set.
